entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
